word_mean: 散光：眼的反射面曲度参差不等，结果点源光线不是准确地集中在视网膜的焦点上，而是散布在一个或大或小的弥散区。这是由于在一个平面上曲度半径长于或短于与其垂直的半径

sentence.Network_en: Maybe you fall asleep in class because of uncorrected astigmatism.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许你在课堂上睡觉是因为你的眼睛散光.

sentence.Network_en: They have what is called astigmatism.
Under astigmatism even narrow parallel light beams will not combine into one point.
sentence.Network_cn: 有象散存在时甚至很窄的平行光束都不能会聚在一点.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 散字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 散工〖 daylabor〗 散光〖 astigmatism〗 散话〖 digression〗.
摄影英语词汇（转） ... Arc 弧形 Astigmatism 像散 Auto bracket 自动包围.
生物学专业英语词汇(A) ... asthma 气喘 astigmatism 乱视 astomatous 无气孔的.
图文镜片光学设计采用对称的方法排列,将凹透镜组置于前后两端,而凸透镜组置于中心,能减低影像变形、放大时的色差现象及称为像散现象(Astigmatism)的彗星形像差。凹透镜组.

list.abs: myopic 近视的myopic astigmatism 近视散光myoreceptor 肌感受器
英语翻译-心理学专业词汇英语翻译 ... irregular 不规则的 irregular astigmatism 不规则散光 irregular variation 不正常变动.
astigmatic lens 像散透镜，散光镜astigmatic tester 散光试验器astigmatism 散光，像散
hyperopia 远视hyperopic astigmatism 远视散光hyperorchidism 睾丸机能亢进

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from a- 'without' + Greek stigma 'point' + -ism

entry.def: If someone has astigmatism, the front of their eye has a slightly irregular shape, so they cannot see properly.

means.word_mean: 1. (ophthalmology) impaired eyesight resulting usually from irregular conformation of the cornea
2. (optics) defect in an optical system in which light rays from a single point fail to converge in a single focal point

auth_sentence.content: Two-thirds of people with short-sightedness also have significant astigmatism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two-thirds of people with short-sightedness also have significant astigmatism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two-thirds of people with short-sightedness also have significant astigmatism.

auth_sentence.content: In some cases, astigmatism can be corrected by an operation called refractive surgery, which reshapes the cornea.
auth_sentence.res_content: In some cases, astigmatism can be corrected by an operation called refractive surgery, which reshapes the cornea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In some cases, astigmatism can be corrected by an operation called refractive surgery, which reshapes the cornea.

auth_sentence.content: Most people have a slight astigmatism - it's rare for the cornea to have developed in a perfectly symmetrical way.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most people have a slight astigmatism - it's rare for the cornea to have developed in a perfectly symmetrical way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most people have a slight astigmatism - it's rare for the cornea to have developed in a perfectly symmetrical way.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具备某种性质"; 2. 表示"学术或学术流派,行业"; 3. 表示"行为,现象,状态"; 4. 表示"疾病"; 5. 名词,表示"各种主义,宗教"
